about_the_game:
Overview

In the far western reaches of the continent of Yusia lies an ancient and peaceful nation—the Kingdom of Tilastea. This civilized nation has long adhered to a policy of neutrality, quietly guarding its own land. However, in the east, the ambitious Saharu Empire sought relentless expansion, igniting a war that engulfed the entire continent. Many nations fell beneath the iron boots of the Saharu Empire.

The emperor of the Saharu Empire, Glausin III, coveted Tilastea's national treasure—the legendary Frozen Blade, Faliz. In his quest to seize this mythical sword, he launched a sudden and brutal invasion against the Kingdom of Tilastea. Caught off guard, the kingdom was swiftly overwhelmed by the imperial forces.

With the nation on the brink of collapse, the king of Tilastea made a difficult decision. He ordered his second daughter, Princess Elissa, to flee with the Frozen Blade, Faliz, and head for the distant borderlands of Arcadia. As the relentless imperial forces closed in, Princess Elissa embarked on a perilous journey, bearing the weight of her kingdom’s fate and the sacred blade, determined to forge a path forward.

Features

  • Turn-based SRPG game with clear rules. Your strategy determines victory or defeat!

  • Carefully designed pixel-level battle animations.

  • Challenging turn-based combat with various objectives for each level, including defeat, puzzles, survival, escape, and time limits.

  • Take advantage of the weapon triangle system and use weapon affinities to crush your enemies!

  • Arena: Satisfy your desire for "level grinding."

  • Diverse unit classes, with units able to promote into multiple classes.

  • You can also forge and craft weapons!

short_description: "Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz" is an SRPG set in the medieval world of Yusia. A modern high school student is mysteriously transported to this ancient land and caught in its conflicts. Alongside a princess, they embark on a dangerous journey filled with intrigue and hidden secrets.
